ReasonsDifficultToHaveOwnPlace=CUSP: Losing a job or losing income from a job (i.e. hours cut, lost portion of a job)
Losing income not related to a job (i.e. gambling, welfare cut off)
Increased expenses (i.e. rent, mortgage, healthcare, drugs and alcohol)
Not enough income to afford lease (low-paying job, Welfare not enough)
Your own physical or mental health
Getting into trouble with the law
Someone you were depending on for housing, food, or money was no longer able to willing to help you out
